data.title: TrakaiâThe Old Capital of LithuaniaÂ
data.meta_description: Trakai, is the old capital of Lithuania and the site of the only Eastern European castle built on an island. Visitors come to this beautiful setting and learn about Lithuanian lore and experience its dense culture.
